subject: Sleep
title: Mindfulness and Sleep Quality
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Mindfulness and Sleep Quality.

hook.text: Monks who meditate for decades show dramatically different sleep patterns. They reach deep sleep faster and stay longer.

buildup.text: Mindfulness meditation reduces activity in the default mode network, quieting the brain's rumination circuits.

discovery.text: Regular meditators show increased slow-wave sleep and fewer nighttime awakenings in controlled studies.

twist.text: Even eight weeks of mindfulness training improves sleep quality comparably to sleep medication in mild insomnia.

climax.text: Mindfulness works by reducing hyperarousal, the core mechanism that keeps anxious insomniacs awake.

punchline.text: A calm mind falls asleep without even trying.

quiz.question: How does mindfulness meditation improve sleep?
options: It tires out the brain through mental exercise
It reduces default mode network activity and hyperarousal
It replaces the need for all sleep stages
